58327.ja: <start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「……ファーベル？<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58328.en: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>Can I have some of that?<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58328.ja: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「オレも……っていいか……？<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58329.en: <start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>What? What? I can't hear you.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58329.ja: <start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「え？　なに？　聞こえないわ。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58330.en:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>I said, ''Can I come with you? I said,
''Can I go with you?<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58330.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「オレも　ついていっていいか！？
　って言ったんだよ！<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58331.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>I'm going with you. You're going with
<pc> to work as an escort?<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58331.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「ついていくって……。
　あなた　<pc>さんと一緒に
　護衛の仕事に行くって言うの？<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58332.en:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>I'm not interested in monster masters.
I'm not interested in monster masters,
but I am interested in their guards.<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58332.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「まもの使いとか　興味ないけどな。
　その……護衛とかは　なんか興味あるし。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58333.ja: <start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「……ふふ。わかったわ。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58334.en:
Okay then . Excuse me, but can you take Fabel with you? She won't listen to me once I start
talking about it.
58334.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「それでは　<pc>さん。すみませんが
　ファーベルも　連れていってもらえますか？
　一度　言いだしたら　この子　聞かなくって。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58335.en:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>I'll just follow along behind you.
Don't worry about me, just go to your
destination.<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58335.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「アンタの後ろから　適当に　ついていくし。
　オレのことは　気にしないで
　目的地まで　行ってくれればいいよ。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58336.en: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>See you. See you later.<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58336.ja: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「じゃ。またな。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58337.en: <start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>Fabel! Fabel, you should thank me.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58337.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「コラッ！　ファーベル！
　あなた　ちゃんと　お礼を言って……<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58338.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>Ha. I'm really sorry. She has no
manners. It's all because I wasn't
there.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58338.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「ハァ……。本当に　申し訳ありません。
　あの子　礼儀がなってなくて。
　私が　いたらないばっかりに……。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58339.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>Well then <pc>. I'm looking
forward to working with you in various
ways.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58339.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「それでは　<pc>さん。
　いろいろと　よろしくお願いしますね。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58340.en:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>Is this where you're supposed to meet
the people you're waiting to escort?<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58340.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「護衛を待っている人との
　待ち合わせ場所って　ここか？<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58341.en:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>The companion monster seems to be
taking to you well. I've been watching
from the back.<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58341.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「……仲間の魔物さ
　アンタに　よく　なついてるみたいだな。
　後ろで　見させてもらってたよ。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58342.en:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Wow! The road is as bad as ever. I'm
going to break my wagon.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58342.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「うわっ！　相変わらず　ひどい道だなあ。
　これじゃあ　馬車が壊れちまうよ。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58343.en:
By ''monster master,'' you mean you, right? I recognized you right away because you have a monster with you.
I'm Tiltzkin, Peddler.
58343.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「まもの使いってのは　あなたのことですね？
　魔物を連れてるから　すぐに　わかりましたよ。
　あたしは　ティルツキン。旅の商人です。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58344.en:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>You are <pc>! Do you remember
me? You were lying on the ground, and
I carried you back to the village.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58344.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「……って　あなたは　<pc>さん！！
　覚えてますか　あたしのこと！？
　ほら　倒れてたあなたを村まで運んであげた……<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58345.en:
I guess I would remember him better if I called him the man who catfished Zoomstone. Anyway, I miss him very
much.
58345.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「いえ……ルーラストーンを　ネコババした男
　と言ったほうが　思いだせそうですかね。
　なんにせよ　なつかしい……なつかしいなあ。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58348.en:
I am, however, currently employed by a certain well-known person. He is also the one who sent the request to you
this time.
58348.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「……と言っても　今は　ある名士の方に
　雇われている身でしてね。今回　あなた方に
　依頼を出したのも　その方なんですよ。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58346.en:
You've grown up a lot in the time I've been away from you. I've changed my mind since then, and I've been working
hard on my business. It's true.
58346.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「しばらく見ない間に　ご立派になられましたね。
　あたしもね　あれから　心を入れ替え
　商売に精を出しているんです。本当ですよ。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58347.en:
I'm currently employed as a merchant for a certain well-known person. He is the one who sent the request to you
this time.
58347.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「今は　ある名士の方の　お抱え商人として
　雇ってもらってましてね。今回　あなた方に
　依頼を出したのも　その方なんですよ。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58349.en:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Alright then, let me explain this
request.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58349.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「さてと……　それでは
　今回の依頼について　説明しましょう。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58350.en:
You may have been told that you are only supposed to provide escort services, but in reality, we would
like to ask you to perform a cleaning service along the way.
58350.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「そちらには　護衛の仕事とだけ
　話が　いってるかもしれませんが　実際には
　道中の　つゆ払いをお願いしたいのです。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58351.en:
I'd like to pick up some food around here, but I hear that there's a ferocious monster called Togas Dogus
lurking around here.
58351.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「あたし　この辺で　採取をしたいんですがね
　なんでも　ここには　トガスのぬしという
　凶暴な魔物が潜んでいるとか……。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58352.en:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>So, I need you to defeat Togas Dogus
so that I can concentrate on my work
of collecting.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
58352.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「そこで　あなたに　トガスのぬしを倒してもらい
　あたしが　気持ちよ～く
　採取に　専念できるようにしてほしいのです。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58353.en:
Togas Dogus seems to have a stronghold west of Togas Rock Road at a place called Toga Square. Get ready and go
there.
58353.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「トガスのぬしは　このトガス岩道の西
　トガの広場という所を　根城にしてるようです。
　準備を整え　そこに行ってみてください。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

58354.en:
I'll be hiding in plain sight while you show me what a monster master you are, so please be sure to take your
companion, monster, with you.
58354.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「あたしは　身を潜めながら
　まもの使いの実力を　見せてもらいますので
　仲間の魔物を　必ず　連れていってくださいね。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63714.en: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>Is that the Togas Dogus?<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63714.ja: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「あれが　トガスのぬしってヤツか。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63715.en:
Heh. Well then.I'm going to take my time and see how strong you and companion's monster can be. Let's see how strong you and your
companion's monster can be.
63715.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「へへっ。それじゃ　<cs_pchero>さん。
　アンタと仲間の魔物が　どんだけ強いか
　ゆっくり　見物させてもらうぜ。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63898.en: <start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Oh! Did you beat Togas Dogus?<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63898.ja: <start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「おお！　トガスのぬしを倒しましたか！<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63899.en:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>(Oh) dear me!<cs_pchero>I have never seen anything like it. It
looks different from when I was in
Pukulet village.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63899.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「いやはや　<cs_pchero>さん。
　プクレット村にいた頃とは　見違えましたね。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63901.en:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>I was watching from behind and was
surprised to see Togas Dogus was such
a monster.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63901.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「後ろから　こっそり見ていましたが
　トガスのぬしが　あんな化け物だったなんて
　おどろきましたよ。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63900.en:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>I am sure you must have experienced
many encounters and partings, and grew
stronger. I am deeply moved.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63900.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「きっと　たくさんの出会いと別れを経験し
　あなたは　強くなっていったのでしょう。
　う～ん　感慨深い……感慨深いなあ。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63902.en:
But, the strength of the monster master is as good as the rumors say. To defeat such a ferocious monster
without even flinching, the monster master is truly amazing.
63902.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「いや　しかし　ウワサにたがわぬ　その強さ。
　あの凶暴な魔物を　ひるまず　倒してしまうとは
　まもの使いというのは　本当に　スゴイですな。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63903.en:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>I will report your success to my
employer, Mr. Sigal. I am sure he will
be very pleased.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63903.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「あたしの雇い主……シガール様にも
　今回の活躍ぶりを　報告しておきますよ。
　さぞ　およろこびになるでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63904.en:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Oops, I should get back to work. Well
then, I'll be going. See you again
sometime.<cs_pchero>...<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63904.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「おっと……　そろそろ　仕事に戻らないと。
　それでは　あたしは行きますね。
　また　いつか会いましょう　<cs_pchero>さん。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63905.en:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>Oops, I should get back to work. Well
then, I'm going to go now. See you
again someday, monster master.<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63905.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00297 _normal m00001>「おっと……　そろそろ　仕事に戻らないと。
　それでは　あたしは行きますね。
　また　いつか会いましょう　まもの使いの方。<stop_lip_animation n00297 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63907.en:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>Why are you playing monster master?
Are you afraid of Kunai, believing in
monsters?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63907.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「アンタは　どうして
　まもの使いなんてやってるんだ？
　魔物を信じるって　怖くないのかよ。<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63908.en:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>I used to train as a monster master.
But suddenly my companion monster
stopped listening to me.<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63908.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「オレも……昔は　まもの使いの修業をしてた。
　でも　急に　仲間の魔物が
　オレの言うことを聞かなくなって……<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63909.en: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>I hurt someone I was with.<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63909.ja: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「一緒にいた人を　傷つけちまったんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63910.en:
I've already had such a sad experience with Kunai, and I've decided not to get involved with monster or monster
master.
63910.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「もう　あんな悲しい思いはしたくないから
　魔物にも……まもの使いにも
　関わらないって　決めたんだよ。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63911.en: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>See you then.<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63911.ja: <start_lip_sync n02286 _normal m00001>「……それじゃな。<stop_lip_animation n02286 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63912.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>I see. The person I was with was hurt
by my companion's MONSTER. That's what
she was saying, wasn't it?<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63912.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「そうですか……。一緒にいた人を
　自分の仲間の魔物が　傷つけてしまった……。
　あの子は　そう言っていたのですね。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63913.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>In fact, the person Fabel was with was
her father, and the companion monster
was Fry.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63913.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「じつは……　ファーベルの言う
　一緒にいた人というのは　あの子の父親のことで
　仲間の魔物というのは　あのキッズなんです。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63914.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>It was when Fabel was in my belly. My
husband brought home one egg from a
monster who had lost his mother.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63914.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「……ファーベルが　私のお腹にいる時でした。
　夫が　母親を失った魔物のタマゴを
　ひとつ　持ち帰りました。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63915.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>And at about the same time that Fabel
was born, a dragon was born from that
egg. That was Fry.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63915.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「そして　ファーベルが産まれると　ほぼ同時に
　そのタマゴからも　一匹のドラゴンが
　産まれたのです。それが……キッズでした。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63916.en:
Fry and Fabel were like brothers, and even after he grew up and became a monster master, they were in perfect
harmony.
63916.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「キッズとファーベルは　兄弟のように仲がよく
　あの子が成長して　まもの使いになった後も
　ふたりの息は　ピッタリでした。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63917.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>But then something happened. When I
moved here, my husband, Fabel, and Fry
went to train.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63917.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「ですが　そんな矢先に　事件が起きたのです。
　こちらに越してきて　夫と　ファーベルと
　キッズで　修業に出向いた時のこと……。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63918.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>Suddenly Fry stopped listening and
attacked Fabel.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63918.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「……突然　キッズが言うことを聞かなくなり
　ファーベルに襲いかかってきたのです。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63919.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>The husband was seriously wounded when
he stood in front of the child to
Whipping Boy Fabel.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63919.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「ファーベルをかばうために
　あの子の前に　立ちふさがった　夫は
　その時　深手を負ってしまいました。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63920.en:
My husband, though wounded, managed to stun the rampaging Fry with a blow to the head, but he was unable to do
anything about it.
63920.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「夫は　負傷しながらも
　暴れるキッズを　当て身で気絶させ
　なんとか　その場を　しのいだのですが……<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63921.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>For some reason, he told Fabel to go
home and left without treating the
wound.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63921.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「なぜか　あの人は　キズの手当てもしないまま
　ファーベルに　家に戻るよう告げると
　ひとりで　その場を立ち去ってしまったのです。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63922.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>Then, after many days of no return, he
was finally found dead.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63922.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「それから　夫の帰らぬ日々が続き
　ついに　あの人は　遺体で発見されました……。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63923.en:
Fabel blamed herself for her father's death on her own immaturity, and since then, she has closed the door to
becoming a monster master.
63923.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「ファーベルは　自分の未熟さから
　父親の死を招いたのだと　自らを責め　それ以来
　まもの使いの道を　閉ざしてしまったのです。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63924.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>I hate to believe that Fry, who I was
so close to, attacked that girl, but
everyone makes mistakes.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63924.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「あんなに　仲のよかったキッズが
　あの子を襲ったなんて　信じたくありませんが
　失敗なんて　誰にでもあるもの。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63925.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>I still hope that you will become a
monster master like him without
worrying.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63925.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「クヨクヨせずに　あの人と同じ
　まもの使いになってほしいと　私は
　今でも　思っているんですけどね……。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63926.en:
I shouldn't have done that! I was totally talking over you. I'm sorry, is just so easy to talk
to.
63926.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「いけない！　すっかり　話し込んじゃいました。
　ごめんなさい　<pc>さんって
　なんだか　すごく　話しやすいから……。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

63927.en:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>I took advantage of your kindness. I
shouldn't have done this.<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
63927.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02293 _normal m00001>「あなたの優しさに　甘えちゃって……。
　いけませんね　こんなことじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>

76218.en:

same momentum we have now!
76218.ja:

　広めていくことだけを考えましょう！<stop_lip_animation n02293 CLOSE_MOUTH>
